function EP01_02()
    -- .起-1「伊草ミナト」
    SaveData.Title = "伊草ミナト"

    -- //BG：1-A教室
    -- //SE：チャイム
    PLAY_SE("SEb016.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG014aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask007",1000,false)

    WAIT(1000)

    MSG([[The chime signaling the end of the entrance exam sounded. As the test papers were collected, the tension snapped, and the pent-up sighs spilled out.
入試の終了を伝えるチャイムが鳴った。 テスト用紙が回収されると同時に緊張の糸が切れ、堰き止めていた溜め息が漏れ出る。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Sadness (Haa---... that was nerve-wracking...)
私服・悲しみ
    （はぁーーー……緊張したなぁ……）]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Sadness (Also, this was by far the hardest exam I've ever taken... I think I answered everything right, but I wonder if it'll be okay.)
私服・悲しみ （それに、今までの入試の中でもダントツで難しかったし……ちゃんと解けたと思うけど、大丈夫かなぁ）]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[Without even having time to check the answers, the staff instructed us to leave. Swept along by the wave of people who took the same exam, I was pushed outside the school building.
答案の答え合わせをする暇もなく、職員の指示で退席を促される。 同じ試験を受けていた人たちの波に押し流されるまま、ボクは校舎の外へと追い出された。]])

STOP_SE("SEb016.wav")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)


    -- //BG：百合愛学園メインストリート

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ac")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav",0)

    MSG([[The clear winter sky looked like a beautiful landscape painting, with the tree-lined path leading to the school gate.
まるで一枚の風景画のように美しい、澄み渡った冬空に、校門へと続く並木道。]])

    MSG([[It’s a little disappointing that it’s so packed front and back that I can’t leisurely take it all in.
前も後ろもヒトでぎゅうぎゅうで、ゆっくりと眺めていられないのが少し残念だ。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Surprise (W-Wow, look at how many people there are. Akira said this is a school girls dream about, and it really is true.)
私服・驚き （す、スゴいヒトの数。 女の子の憧れの学校だってアキラが言ってたけど、本当なんだ）]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[As expected of one of the country’s most prestigious girls’ schools—Yuriai Private Academy’s entrance exam. The number of examinees is on a completely different scale from other schools.
流石は、国内でも有数のお嬢様学校――私立百合愛学園の入試。 受験者の数も他の学校とは、文字通り桁が違う。]])

    MSG([[Of course, everywhere I look around me, there are only girls. I couldn’t find a single earnest examinee like me trying for the boys’ division.
ただ当然、ボクの周囲は見渡す限り女の子ばかり。 ボクのように、男子部を受けようとする殊勝な受験生の姿は、一人も見つけられなかった。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Wry Smile・Sweat (It would’ve been nice to tour the school or talk with other boys taking the exam, but...)
私服・苦笑・汗
    （せっかくだから校内を見学したり、男子部の受験生とお話しできたらよかったんだけど……）]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[Forcibly going against the flow would just cause more confusion. I’ll just go with the flow and board the bus to the nearest station.
ヒトの流れに無理に逆らうと、余計な混乱を生んでしまいそうだ。
      このまま流れに身をまかせて、最寄り駅行きのバスに乗り込むとしよう。]])

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)
WAIT(1000)

PLAY_SE("SEg003.wav")

    -- //CI：バス 001
    -- //BG：繁華街

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI001a")
LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,-1000,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,1000,Ease.OutQuad)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,1000,Ease.OutQuad)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",1000,false)


    MSG([[After about ten minutes on the bus, the area around Yuriai Private Academy, rich in greenery, suddenly changed into a bustling scene.
バスで十数分ほど移動すると、緑の多い百合愛学園の周辺から一転して、賑やかな様相となった。]])

    MSG([[I hadn’t noticed because of my nervousness earlier, but shops of all kinds lined both sides of the road—clothing stores, general stores, eateries. Just looking around was fun.
入試に向かう時は緊張で全然気付けなかったけれど、道路を挟んだ両脇の道沿いに服屋から雑貨屋、飲食店まで、色んな店が建ち並んでいて、眺めているだけで楽しい。]])

    MSG([[No wonder—it’s one of the busiest shopping districts in G prefecture, where I live.
流石はボクの住むＧ県でも有数の繁華街だ。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Smile (Since I’m here, maybe I’ll get off nearby and check out the town on my way to the station.)
私服・笑顔
    （せっかくだしこの辺りで降りて、街を見物しながら駅まで向かおうかな）]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[Yeah, that sounds good. I might find a nice souvenir for my cousin, Akira.
うん、そうしよう。
    　従妹のアキラへのいいお土産も見つかるかもしれないし。]])

    -- SE：バスの降車ボタン
PLAY_SE("SEb038.wav")
WAIT(800)

SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,1000,Ease.Linear)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
WAIT(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[No sooner had I thought that, I pressed the bus stop button and got off in the busy area. Also, maybe because it was right around the company’s quitting time, many people in suits heading to the station were around.
思うが早いか、バスの降車ボタンを押して繁華街へと降り立った。 その上、ちょうど会社の終業時間と重なったのか、駅へ向かうスーツ姿の人々も多い。]])

    MSG([[While overwhelmed by this unfamiliar flood of information, I walked toward the station with the crowd.
慣れない情報量の多さに戸惑いながらも、ボクはヒトの波に沿って、駅へと歩き出す。]])

    MSG([[Along the way—
その途中で――]])


LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004aa")
LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-800,200)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)


    -- //BU：モブ男性

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")
LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("bronde-man1_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Blond Man】
 “Hey, you there!”
「ねぇそこの子！」]])

    MSG([[A blond man called out to me and thrust a miniskirt right in front of my nose.
金髪の男性から声をかけられ、鼻先にミニスカートを突きつけられた。]])

PLAY_VOICE("bronde-man1_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
【Blond Man】
 “You’re super cute! I think this skirt would look great on you. How about buying one?”
「キミとってもカワイイねえ！ このスカート似合うと思うんだけど、どう？　買ってかない？」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Flustered “Hya!? W-W-Wait, a skirt!?”
私服・焦り
    「ひぇあ！？　え、あ、す、スカート！？」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[The man pointed with his thumb toward a punkish clothing store that looked nothing like me!?
男性が親指で指し示す先には、ボクとは無縁そうなパンキッシュな服屋さんが！？]])

    MSG([[If I followed him, I’d no doubt end up buying clothes I don’t want.
このまま付いていけば、断りきれずにいらない衣服を買ってしまうに違いない。]])

PLAY_VOICE("bronde-man1_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
【Blond Man】
 “You’re an examinee for Yuriai Private Academy, right? We’re giving special discounts for exam takers. Come on, let’s go to the store!”
「キミ百合愛学園の受験生でしょ？　受験生割りで安くしとくからさ、ねえ店まで行こうよ！]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0010.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Sadness “N-No thanks!!!”
私服・悲しみ
    「けけけ、結構です！！！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[Avoiding eye contact, I ran away. Immediately after, a brown-haired woman grabbed my shoulder.
目を合わさぬようにして駆け去る。
    　それから間髪を入れず、茶髪の女性に肩を掴まれた。]])

    -- //BU：モブ女性
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB05aa")
LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("colour-woman_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Brown-Haired Woman】
 “You’ve got such beautiful hair~ <sprite="Emoji" name="note"> We’re recruiting models for cuts right now, how about it? I’ll make you look like the idol Hermes-chan.”
「キミ、キレイな髪してんね～<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> 今カットモデル募集中なんだけど、どう？ アイドルのエルメスちゃんみたくしてあげるよ？」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0011.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Flustered “A cut model!? I-I’m a guy, so that’s impossible! G-Goodbye!”
私服・焦り 「カットモデル！？　ぼぼ、ボク男なので無理です！ さ、さようなら！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[I twisted my shoulder gently to free her hand and ran again.
肩をひねって優しく女性の手をほどき、再び走る。]])

    MSG([[But soon after, my path was blocked by a group of men.
ところが矢継ぎ早に、進行方向を男性の集団に塞がれてしまった。]])

    -- //BU：モブ男性×いっぱい
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")
LAYER_LOAD(51,"BU_MOB01aa")
LAYER_LOAD(52,"BU_MOB01aa")
LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_ALPHA(51,0)
LAYER_ALPHA(52,0)
LAYER_POSITION(51,750,0)
LAYER_POSITION(52,-750,0)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(51,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(52,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(51,550,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(52,-550,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("colour-man_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Brown-Haired Man】
 “Hey hey, you too, coming back from the exam? We’re chilling at that burger place. Wanna join?”
「ねえねえ、キミも受験帰り？　オレたちそこのハンバーガー屋でダベるんだけど、一緒にどう？」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0012.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Surprise “Eh... y-You guys...?”
私服・驚き
    「え……あ、アナタたち……」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[Bearded, brown-haired, nose-pierced, silver chains. These men clearly weren’t the same age as me. I thought they might be college students, or maybe even working adults.
髭面に茶髪、鼻ピアスにシルバーチェーン。 男性たちは見るからに同年代ではない。 大学生か、下手したら社会人ではないかと思われる。]])

    MSG([[This was an obvious pick-up attempt disguised as fellow examinees. And I’m sure they mistook my gender again.
同じ受験生を装った、あからさまなナンパだ。
    　また、ボクの性別が勘違いされてしまったのだろう。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0013.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Sadness (Honestly, I hate how I look sometimes...)
私服・悲しみ
    （本当に、自分の容姿が嫌になるなぁ…）]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[I lightly slapped my annoying face and told the men the truth.
ボクは憎々しい自分の顔を軽くはたき、男性たちに真実を告げた。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0014.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Wry Smile・Sweat “...I’m a guy. Is that still okay?”
私服・苦笑・汗 「……ボク、男なんですけど。 それでもいいんですか？」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("colour-man_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
【Brown-Haired Man】
 “Gahaha! Stop kidding, Yoshiko-chan! There’s no way a cute kid like you is a guy—”
「ぎゃはは！　冗談はよしこちゃんだって！ キミみたいなカワイイ子が男なワケ――」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0015.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Normal “You can tell if you touch. I don’t have breasts, right?”
私服・通常
    「触れば分かりますよ。胸、ないでしょう？」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[I took the brown-haired man’s hand and pressed it against my chest. He made a shocked face and took a step back.
ボクは茶髪の男性の手をとって、自分の胸に押し当ててみせた。
    　男性がギョッとした顔となり、一歩後ずさる。]])

    MSG([[When mistaken for the opposite sex, letting them touch your chest is the quickest way to clear things up. It’s really embarrassing, but I know from experience that it’s better than complicating things.
性別を誤解された時には胸を触らせるのが手っ取り早い。 かなり恥ずかしいけれど、話がこじれるよりマシだと、これまでの人生の経験則でよく知っている。]])

    MSG([[After a quick discussion, the men turned to me with irritated expressions—
男性たちは全員で軽く話し合った後、不機嫌そうにボクへ向き直って――]])

PLAY_VOICE("colour-man_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
【Brown-Haired Man】
 “You’re confusing as hell, kid! Dress more manly!”
「紛らわしいんだよガキ！
    　もっと男らしい格好しとけ！」]])

    -- //SE：頭を叩く音
PLAY_SE("SEc036.wav")
EFFECT_SCREEN(1,30,30,300,false,true)
--WAIT(300)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0016.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Sadness “Ugh.”
私服・悲しみ
    「うぐっ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(51,"")
LAYER_LOAD(52,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[He slapped my head with a parting insult, then walked off toward the station.
捨て台詞と共にボクの頭を叩き、そのまま駅へと向かって歩いていった。]])

    MSG([[Frustration swelled inside me at the unfair treatment. But the fact that I look confusing is true, so it can’t be helped.
理不尽な仕打ちに、胸の内で膨らむモヤモヤ。
    　ただ、ボクの容姿が紛らわしいのは事実だし、仕方ない。]])

    MSG([[I’d been skipping haircuts because of the exam lately, so I probably caused even more misunderstandings. I really hate my unmanly appearance.
最近、受験にかまけて散髪をサボっていたから、きっと余計に誤解を招いてしまうんだ。 男らしくない自分の容姿に、つくづく嫌気がさす。]])

    MSG([[My still jittery and uncertain heartbeat sounded painfully loud in my ears.
未だに落ち着かない弱気な心音が、やたらと耳障りに感じられた。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Casual Clothes・Sadness “I still can’t catch up to my sister.”
私服・悲しみ
    「まだまだ、姉さんには追いつけそうにないな」]])

--吉　ロケットペンダントのカットインがあってもいいかも

    -- //CI：002_1
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI002a")
LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-400)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutQuad)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutQuad)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask007",500,false)


LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[I reached for the pocket watch pendant hanging from my neck, pressed its top button, and opened the lid.
首から下げたロケットペンダントに手を伸ばし、頂点のボタンを押して、蓋を開いた。]])

    MSG([[Inside was a photo of me, my sister, and my cousin from when we were kids.
その中には、ボクと姉さんと従妹で撮った、子どもの頃の写真が映っている。]])

    -- //CI：ペンダントの写真（ミナト・マリカ・アキラ） 002_2
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI002b")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[It has encouraged me many times since my sister left home two years ago after enrolling at Yuriai Private Academy.
二年前に姉さんが百合愛学園への入学をきっかけに実家を出て以来、何度も励まされてきた写真だ。]])

    MSG([[Akira mocks me, saying "Who still uses analog photos?" but I believe carrying this tangible item has a strong effect. ...At least I think so.
「今どきアナログの写真なんて」とアキラはバカにするけれど、モノとして身につけていることの効果は大きい。 ……と思う。]])

    MSG([[Because just holding the pendant like this and closing the lid gives me strength.
事実、こうして蓋を閉じてペンダントを握っているだけで、パワーをもらえるのだから。]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask008",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-400,500,Ease.Linear)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BU：モブ男性

PLAY_VOICE("suit-man1_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Man in Suit】
 “Excuse me, you’re blocking the way.”
「あのー、通行の邪魔なんですけど」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0018.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
Flustered “Ah! S-Sorry!!”
焦り
    「あっ！？！　ご、ごめんなさい！！」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[I suddenly remembered I’d stopped in the middle of the road and hurriedly stepped forward.
道の真ん中で立ち止まっていたことを思い出し、慌てて前に歩き出した。]])

    MSG([[Hah. Today is worse than usual. Maybe my mood’s off after finishing the exam. I’ll go straight home without detours and sleep soundly in bed.
ハァ。今日はいつも以上にダメダメだ。 受験終わりでテンションがおかしいのかも。 もう寄り道せずに帰って、ベッドでぐっすり眠ろう。]])

    -- 　　　　◆

    -- //BG：駅前
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG002aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)


    MSG([[As I spotted G Station, I sensed something was wrong.
Ｇ駅が見えてきた時に異変に気付いた。]])



    -- //BU：モブ男性、素顔リラ（真剣）、モブ女子生徒

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG002aa")
LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
LAYER_ANGLE(LAYER_BG,30)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB09aa")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIK01ba")
LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,600,-130)
LAYER_POSITION(55,200,-130)
LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,-150)
LAYER_SCALE(60,150,150)
LAYER_ANGLE(50,20)
LAYER_ANGLE(55,20)
LAYER_ANGLE(60,20)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",500,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav",0,true)

PLAY_VOICE("colour-man_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
【Brown-Haired Man】
 “I’m telling you! I just want to talk about the exam, okay!? I don’t need you, just let me talk to that girl!”
「だからさー！　ちょっと試験の話をしたいだけって言ってんだろ！？　お前には用ねえから、その子と話をさせろって言ってんの！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
【Glasses Girl】
Casual Lira・Serious “I saw you roughly grabbing her arm, didn’t I? Picking on a timid girl who can’t say no is disgusting!”
素顔リラ・真剣 「腕を乱暴に引っ張ってたの見たんだけど？ 断れない気弱そうな子を狙うとか最低だね！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
【Glasses Girl】
Casual Lira・Serious “There’s no way I can ignore scum like you!”
素顔リラ・真剣
